task.title: Defining the server preference
task.shortdesc: Using the Preferences page, you can define attribute used for testing projects by the servers.

taskbody.context: To define this preference, complete the following steps:

step.cmd: In the toolbar, select Window Preferences.
In the Preferences page, select Server.
Specify the following setting by selecting the check box:

dlentry.dt: Show Servers view when server state changes
dlentry.dd: The Servers view is displayed on the workbench when there are any activities in the Servers view. For more details about the server states refer to the Servers View topic.

step.cmd: Click Apply and then OK to save your changes.
